location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant Thomas Blast, Bushire, to Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun, Native Resident, Bushire

mods.abstract: Thomas Blast informs Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun [Mirza Mahdi 'Ali Khan Bahadur], Native Resident at Bushire, that he has arrived at Bushire for the purpose of taking charge of any public dispatches intended for India. Blast adds that he is obliged to remain in Bushire for no longer than twenty-four hours, as he has a packet from the Resident at Bussora [Basra] which is of great consequence.
